title: Gaming on Ergo
summary:
The document discusses gaming on the Ergo blockchain. It highlights various metaverse projects, NFT-based games, and monetary-based games. The key points include:

- ErgoGames.io is a platform showcasing games developed for the Ergo blockchain.
- Metaverse projects like Cyberverse and SigmaValley (inactive) aim to integrate blockchain technology for unique player experiences.
- NFT-based games like BlitzTCG, Digigoats, and Project Tesseract are being developed.
- Monetary-based games like Grand Gambit are also mentioned.
- The document also provides developer resources such as ergflip, ObolFlip, and Hypo10use.

qa_pairs.question: What is ErgoGames.io?
qa_pairs.answer: ErgoGames.io is a platform dedicated to showcasing games developed for the Ergo Blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is Cyberverse?
qa_pairs.answer: Cyberverse is an open-world, pixel-based game filled with various opportunities to socialize with others and earn while doing so, with blockchain integration using the Ergo Blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is SigmaValley?
qa_pairs.answer: SigmaValley is the first metaverse on the Ergo blockchain, aiming to be a caricaturesque and up-to-date visualization of the Ergo ecosystem, inspired by the Silicon Valley TV series Intro.

qa_pairs.question: What is BlitzTCG?
qa_pairs.answer: BlitzTCG aims to revolutionize traditional TCG (Trading Card Game) gameplay.

qa_pairs.question: What is Digigoats?
qa_pairs.answer: Digigoats is a game developed by the Screaming ERGoat Wine Club, where players can feed, train, and battle their Ergoat to reach the top of the leaderboards. Screaming ERGoats are one-of-a-kind NFTs exclusive to the Ergo Blockchain.

sections.heading: Gaming on Ergo
Developer Resources
sections.content:
- [ergflip](https://www.ergflip.com/), a simple and not decentralized Ergo Coinflip.
- [ObolFlip](https://github.com/ObolFlip) client can be used for taking bets on a flip or for managing flips and earning revenue, depending on what's legal in your location. You can even deploy it on a server and let other users do bets, earning extra revenue for withdrawals.
- [Hypo10use](https://github.com/hypo10use/quid-games) an example project built as part of Ergo Hack 2 and Ergo Hack 3
